name: a2agents-website
description: Official website for A2Agents consulting practice

scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/*.html src/robots.txt src/CNAME dist/ 2>/dev/null && cp -r src/js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null && cp -r src/resume dist/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: A2Agents
